mapper.insert: INSERT INTO files ( file_name, file_path, original_name, file_size, file_type, description, user_id, student_id, application_id ) VALUES ( #{fileName}, #{filePath}, #{originalName}, #{fileSize}, #{fileType}, #{description}, #{userId}, #{studentId}, #{applicationId} )
mapper.select: SELECT id, file_name as fileName, file_path as filePath, original_name as originalName, file_size as fileSize, file_type as fileType, description, upload_time as uploadTime, user_id as userId, student_id as studentId, application_id as applicationId FROM files WHERE user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY upload_time DESC

SELECT id, file_name as fileName, file_path as filePath, original_name as originalName, file_size as fileSize, file_type as fileType, description, upload_time as uploadTime, user_id as userId, student_id as studentId, application_id as applicationId FROM files WHERE student_id = #{studentId} ORDER BY upload_time DESC

SELECT id, file_name as fileName, file_path as filePath, original_name as originalName, file_size as fileSize, file_type as fileType, description, upload_time as uploadTime, user_id as userId, student_id as studentId, application_id as applicationId FROM files WHERE student_id = #{studentId} AND application_id = #{applicationId} ORDER BY upload_time DESC

SELECT id, file_name as fileName, file_path as filePath, original_name as originalName, file_size as fileSize, file_type as fileType, description, upload_time as uploadTime, user_id as userId, student_id as studentId, application_id as applicationId FROM files WHERE id = #{fileId}
